subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: A day after failing to land Ben Zobrist, the Mets traded Jon Niese to the Pirates for Walker, a second baseman, and added Cabrera, a shortstop. The moves signaled the end of Daniel Murphy’s tenure.
snippet: A day after failing to land Ben Zobrist, the Mets traded Jon Niese to the Pirates for Walker, a second baseman, and added Cabrera, a shortstop. The moves signaled the end of Daniel Murphy’s tenure.
